author: neels
msg: 1.7.x backport fix for issue #4000. Depends on r1164027!
and add a missing line in externals_tests.py. Combined log:
Follow-up to r1135743: Omit file externals from WC->WC copy.
(Only recursion is affected. File externals passed as explicit copy sources
still result in first-class file nodes, copied from the external's URL.)
Use the correct path, CHILD_SRC_ABSPATH, to query externalness. Comment.
Avoids first-class file nodes in copy.
Don't select file externals. Avoids incomplete nodes in copy.
New test. NOTE: this test depends on r1164027!

msg: Fix NPE when building geornimo mejb plugin.
